<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeBooleanConstant"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeBooleanConstant

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeConstant](class_visualshadernodeconstant.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A boolean constant to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Has only one output port and no inputs.

Translated to ``bool`` in the shader language.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
